title: Dark Star Bundle Bug [CLIENT]
body: Not sure if I'm posting this in the right spot but since dark star thresh was removed due to issues it also inadvertently removed the dark star bundle available for purchase since the dark star thresh skin is no longer in the store. can you please extend the time available for the bundle to be purchased as it is advertised to be available from 6-16 through 6-20 and for a day or two ongoing time it has not been available in the store. thank you for your time. I would like to buy the skin but I don't think its fair that I missed the initial launch of the skin and now I am unable to get it until the Dark Star Thresh skin is returned to the store for purchase.

replies.body:
Hey War Blue Dragon - 

Due to Dark Star Thresh being disabled (super sorry about that!), we will be extending the sale of the bundle! We're working on updating the details on the promo website, so be sure to check back there for official dates! :)
I really appreciate the reply thanks for the update have an awesome day
Don't worry, we are gonna get the left over time when the skin has been fixed :)
I hope so I really want the bundle but can't get it and I'm not sure if riot has noticed yet.
they better fix my fucking skin soon!!!!!!
